Text:
It's an mp4.

mp4s are useless to me so I can't comment on the quality. I'm still hoping for an avi torrent with no extra files; I hate having my folder tree screwed up.

I love mp4s - the newer codecs are the best! I'm so glad someone is doing doctor who in a small size! 

Thanks again, Charles!

Hope you find your avi, Llwynog!

Cheers!
